boardgame.description: Power Grid: Factory Manager is the new stand-alone game in the world of Power Grid. It was released at Spiel '09 in Essen, Germany._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player owns a factory and tries to earn the most money during the game. To be successful, each player must use his workers to buy the best machines and robots at the market and to run the machines most effectively in his factory. Because of increasing energy prices, the players must be careful to check the energy consumption of their factories and to avoid using only energy-consuming machines. Otherwise, their profit will suddenly vanish, the worst fear of a good businessperson._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Power Grid: Factory Manager uses a clever market mechanism for choosing the supply of factory tiles in the market._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

2010 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

Rio Grande Games (RIO 402) Number of players: 2-5 Age of players: 12+ Length: 60 minutes Game Description: Welcome to the world of Power Grid. After Power Grid taught you the tough competition between energy producers, now you get to know the road traveled b y energy consumers. Start to be a Factory Manager and make the important decisions to improve your own factory. Fight against the other competitors for the best factory equipment available in the market to be the best player at the end of the game. Power Grid - Factory Manager is a Business-Buildup-Game. You start with a small factory and try to improve it. At the beginning you may simply focus on increasing the production. Later you are confronted with new challenges: track the ever increasing energy price and cleverly distribute your workers for the best benefit. By being close to the theme, the game is logical and coherent in its main features. A clever new mechanism improves the game by affecting the player order and the actions on the market. But don’t say we did not warn you: Because of only 5 turns the game is exciting right from the start. Be careful all the time or your fellow players will mercilessly leave you behind!

Rio Grande Games (RIO 402) Number of players: 2-5 Age of players: 12+ Length: 60 minutes Game Description: Welcome to the world of Power Grid. After Power Grid taught you the tough competition between energy producers, now you get to know the road traveled b y energy consumers. Start to be a Factory Manager and make the important decisions to improve your own factory. Fight against the other competitors for the best factory equipment available in the market to be the best player at the end of the game. Power Grid - Factory Manager is a Business-Buildup-Game. You start with a small factory and try to improve it. At the beginning you may simply focus on increasing the production. Later you are confronted with new challenges: track the ever increasing energy price and cleverly distribute your workers for the best benefit. By being close to the theme, the game is logical and coherent in its main features. A clever new mechanism improves the game by affecting the player order and the actions on the market. But don’t say we did not warn you: Because of only 5 turns the game is exciting right from the start. Be careful all the time or your fellow players will mercilessly leave you behind!

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. I will only charge the actual USPS or Fed Ex (your choice) shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. The game has been played but is in excellent condition. All the pieces have been sorted and bagged and the box insert has been removed. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will be glad to combine orders to save on shipping.

Only played once. #General: All of my games come from a passionate boardgaming household with no pets and no smoking Usually they are packed with sorting boxes and zip bags to ease and shorten ahe setup and break down time I only ship insured! #Versand nach Deutschland (Post/DHL, alle Preise in Euro): Einschreiben (Versicherung = 20,00 €): Großbrief (bis 0,5 kg): 4 € Maxibrief (bis 1,0 kg): 5 € Maxibrief (bis 2,0 kg): 7,5 € Zusatzversicherung: 2€ pro 100€ Versicherung Paket (bis 2,0 kg): 5 € Paket (bis 10,0 kg): 6 € Paket (bis 20,0 kg): 11 € Paket (bis 31,5 kg): 13 € Bis 500 € versichert #International Shipping (DHL, all prices in Euro):: Inscribed letter (insured up to 35,00 €) Letter (up to 0,5 kg): 6,5 € worldwide Letter (up to 1,0 kg): 11 € worldwide Letter (up to 2,0 kg): 21 € worldwide ### extra insurance: add 2 € for every additional 100,00 € Parcel (up to 2,0 kg): 15 € (only EU) --_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; insured up to 500 € Parcel (up to 5,0 kg): 17 € (EU) or 30 € (Rest of Europe) or 35 € (USA/CAN) oder 45 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 10,0 kg): 22 € (EU) or 35 € (Rest of Europe) or 50 € (USA/CAN) oder 60 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 20,0 kg): 32 € (EU) or 50 € (Rest of Europe) or 70 € (USA/CAN) oder 95 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 31,5 kg): 42 € (EU) or 55 € (Rest of Europe) or 95 € (USA/CAN) oder 125 € (Rest of World) Insured up to 500,00 € worldwide NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE AND WRAPPING! #Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Since October 2011 PP-fees are 0,35 Euro + (from 3,9% to 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. Paypal does not allow uninsured shipment above 25 Euro and shipments to any other address than the one submitted with the payment. Thank you Daniel
